attributes.action: Hadleigh castle and leigh on sea coast given national park status and allow rewilding
attributes.additional_details:
My aim with petition is to get the government department for environment, Food and Rural Affairs to allow a report to look at designation of Hadleigh castle and and leigh country park and coast line as new national park to give it greater protection from being spoiled from development. I would like to see rewilding along the coast with planting of new  large forest area created and ponds with additional of bring some exinct species back in future like

European Beaver
European Stork
European Tarpan Wild Horse
European Spoon bill
European native cattle breeds
European Red Squirrel
European Wildcat
European Pool frogs
European Tree Frogs
European Golden Eagle
European Ospray
European Roe deer
European Dormice
European Glow worm
